description:
The bonus part of the course about the industrial design and product prototyping in Autodesk Alias.

The course thoroughly understanding a advanced details of construction and use A-class surfaces in Autodesk Alias based on complex and interesting example of Classic Muscle Car vehicle. Despite this, the course is not a textbook for the Autodesk Alias primarily describes the principles and tricks of surface modeling. The knowledge that you will get during the training does not depend on the application version.

The course is suitable for novice and advanced user, who want to learn more about the wonderful world 3D prototyping.

The course was prepared and recorded by Padalka Alexander, in cooperation with Instructors, Igor Halustov. Course recorded in Russian and English languages (Mostly in Russian), all these tools saved the original English name.

We wish you a pleasant viewing and new achievements in the works!

Sincerely, Alexander Padalka.
title: Autodesk Alias. Muscle Car Modelling
